text: Sometime afterward he went on through towns and villages, preaching and proclaiming the good news of the kingdom of God. The twelve were with him,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> also <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">women</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> had <st data-num="1510">been</st> <st data-num="2323" class="">healed</st> <st data-num="575" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirits</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="769" class="">disabilities:</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3137" class="">Mary</st><n id="3" /> (<st data-num="2564">called</st> <st data-num="3094" class="">Magdalene)</st>, <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st> had <st data-num="1831">gone out</st>,
and Joanna the wife of Cuza (Herod’s household manager), Susanna, and many others who provided for them out of their own resources.
While a large crowd was gathering and people were coming to Jesus from one town after another, he spoke to them in a parable:

“A <st data-num="4687" class="">sower</st> <st data-num="1831">went out</st> to <st data-num="4687" class="">sow</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4703" class="">seed</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1722">as</st> he <st data-num="4687" class="">sowed</st>, <st data-num="3303" class="">some</st> <st data-num="4098" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">along</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">path</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> was <st data-num="2662">trampled on</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3772">wild</st> <st data-num="4071" class="">birds</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2719" class="">devoured</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.

<st data-num="2087" class="">Other</st> seed <st data-num="2667" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="4073" class="">rock</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> when it <st data-num="5453">came up</st>, it <st data-num="3583" class="">withered</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st> it <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="2429" class="">moisture</st>.

<st data-num="2087" class="">Other</st> seed <st data-num="4098" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="3319" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="173" class="">thorns</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="173">they</st> <st data-num="4855" class="">grew up with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> and <st data-num="638" class="">choked</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.
But other seed fell on good soil and grew, and it produced a hundred times as much grain.” As he said this, he called out, “The one who has ears to hear had better listen!”
Then his disciples asked him what this parable meant.

He said, “You have been given the opportunity to know the secrets of the kingdom of God, but for others they are in parables, so that although they see they may not see, and although they hear they may not understand.
“Now the parable means this: The seed is the word of God.

Those <st data-num="3844" class="">along</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">path</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the ones who have <st data-num="191" class="">heard;</st> <st data-num="1534" class="">then</st> the <st data-num="1228" class="">devil</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="142">takes away</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> they may <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st><n id="3" /> and be <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st>.

Those<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="4073" class="">rock</st> are the ones <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1209" class="">receive</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> they <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> it, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3778">they</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4491" class="">root</st>. They <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">for</st> a <st data-num="2540" class="">while</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="2540" class="">time</st> of <st data-num="3986" class="">testing</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="868">fall away</st>.<n id="5" />

As for the seed that<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4098" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="1519">among</st> <st data-num="173" class="">thorns</st>, <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the ones who <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="2" /> as they <st data-num="4198" class="">go on</st> their way they are <st data-num="4846" class="">choked</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="3308" class="">worries</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4149" class="">riches</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2237" class="">pleasures</st> of <st data-num="979" class="">life</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> their fruit does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5052" class="">mature</st>.<n id="5" />
But as for the seed that landed on good soil, these are the ones who, after hearing the word, cling to it with an honest and good heart, and bear fruit with steadfast endurance.
“No one lights a lamp and then covers it with a jar or puts it under a bed, but puts it on a lampstand so that those who come in can see the light.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">nothing</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2927" class="">hidden</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> <st data-num="5318" class="">revealed</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">nothing</st> <st data-num="614" class="">concealed</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="1097">made known</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="5318" class="">light</st>.
So listen carefully, for whoever has will be given more, but whoever does not have, even what he thinks he has will be taken from him.”
Now Jesus’ mother and his brothers came to him, but they could not get near him because of the crowd.

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> he was <st data-num="518" class="">told</st>, “<st data-num="4771" class="">Your</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st> are <st data-num="2476" class="">standing</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">outside</st>, <st data-num="2309" class="">wanting</st> to <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.”
But he replied to them, “My mother and my brothers are those who hear the word of God and do it.”
One day Jesus got into a boat with his disciples and said to them, “Let’s go across to the other side of the lake.” So they set out,

<st data-num="1161">and</st> as <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="4126" class="">sailed</st> he <st data-num="879" class="">fell asleep</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Now</st> a <st data-num="2978" class="">violent</st> <st data-num="417" class="">windstorm</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2597">came down</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="3041" class="">lake</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the boat<n id="3" /> started <st data-num="4845">filling up with water</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="2793">were in danger</st>.

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4334" class="">came</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="1326" class="">woke</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="1988" class="">Master</st>, <st data-num="1988" class="">Master</st>,<n id="3" /> we are about to <st data-num="622" class="">die</st>!” <st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="4" /> he <st data-num="1326" class="">got up</st> and <st data-num="2008" class="">rebuked</st><n id="5" /> the <st data-num="417" class="">wind</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2830">raging waves</st>;<n id="6" /> they <st data-num="3973">died down</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> it <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1055" class="">calm</st>.
Then he said to them, “Where is your faith?” But they were afraid and amazed, saying to one another, “Who then is this? He commands even the winds and the water, and they obey him!”
So they sailed over to the region of the Gerasenes, which is opposite Galilee.

As<n id="1" /> <st data-num="846">Jesus</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1831" class="">stepped</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">ashore</st>,<n id="3" /> a <st data-num="5100" class="">certain</st> <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="5221" class="">met</st> him who was <st data-num="2192" class="">possessed</st> by <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st>.<n id="5" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">For</st> a <st data-num="2425" class="">long</st> <st data-num="5550" class="">time</st> this man<n id="6" /> had <st data-num="1746" class="">worn</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">clothes</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> had <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3306" class="">lived</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st><n id="7" /> the <st data-num="3418" class="">tombs</st>.

When he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, he <st data-num="349">cried out</st>, <st data-num="4363" class="">fell<n id="2" /> down</st> before <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">shouted</st> with a <st data-num="3173" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st>, “Leave <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> alone,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of the <st data-num="5310">Most High</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>! I <st data-num="1189" class="">beg</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="928" class="">torment</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>!”

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> Jesus<n id="1" /> had started <st data-num="3853" class="">commanding</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="169" class="">evil</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> to <st data-num="1831" class="">come out</st> <st data-num="575" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="444" class="">man</st>. (<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> it had <st data-num="4884" class="">seized</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="5550" class="">times</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">so</st><n id="4" /> he would be <st data-num="1195" class="">bound</st> with <st data-num="254" class="">chains</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3976" class="">shackles</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5442">kept under guard</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="6" /> he would <st data-num="1284" class="">break</st> the <st data-num="1199" class="">restraints</st> and be <st data-num="1643" class="">driven</st> <st data-num="5259">by</st> the <st data-num="1140" class="">demon</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="2048">deserted<n id="7" /> places</st>.)<n id="8" />

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1161">then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1905" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="5101">What</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>?” He<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="3003">Legion</st>,”<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st> had <st data-num="1525" class="">entered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> they began to <st data-num="3870" class="">beg</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2443">to</st> <st data-num="2004" class="">order</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> to <st data-num="565" class="">depart</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="12" class="">abyss</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> a <st data-num="2425" class="">large</st> <st data-num="34" class="">herd</st> of <st data-num="5519" class="">pigs</st> was <st data-num="1006" class="">feeding</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="3735" class="">hillside</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the demonic spirits<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3870" class="">begged</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2010" class="">let</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>. He <st data-num="2010">gave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2010" class="">permission</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st> <st data-num="1831">came out</st> <st data-num="575" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> and <st data-num="1525" class="">went</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="5519" class="">pigs</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="34" class="">herd</st> of pigs<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3729" class="">rushed down</st> the <st data-num="2911">steep slope</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="3041" class="">lake</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="638" class="">drowned</st>.

When<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="1006" class="">herdsmen</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> what had <st data-num="1096" class="">happened</st>, they <st data-num="5343">ran off</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="518">spread the news</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="68" class="">countryside</st>.

<st data-num="1161">So</st><n id="1" /> the people <st data-num="1831" class="">went out</st> to <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> what had <st data-num="1096" class="">happened</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>. They<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> the <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> the <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st> had <st data-num="1831" class="">gone out</st>, <st data-num="2521" class="">sitting</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">at</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus’</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st>, <st data-num="2439" class="">clothed</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4993">in his right mind</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they were <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st>.

Those<n id="1" /> who had <st data-num="1492" class="">seen</st> it <st data-num="518" class="">told</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> the man who had been <st data-num="1139" class="">demon-possessed</st> had been <st data-num="4982" class="">healed</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="537" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="4128" class="">people</st> of the <st data-num="1086">Gerasenes</st><n id="2" /> and the <st data-num="4066">surrounding region</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2065" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st><n id="4" /> to <st data-num="565" class="">leave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> alone,<n id="5" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">for</st> they were <st data-num="4912">seized with</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="5401" class="">fear</st>.<n id="6" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="7" /> he <st data-num="1684" class="">got</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="4143" class="">boat</st> and <st data-num="5290" class="">left</st>.<n id="8" />

The <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> the <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st> had <st data-num="1831">gone out</st> <st data-num="1189" class="">begged</st> to <st data-num="1510">go</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, but Jesus<n id="2" /> <st data-num="630" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="630">away</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>,
“Return to your home, and declare what God has done for you.” So he went away, proclaiming throughout the whole town what Jesus had done for him.
Now when Jesus returned, the crowd welcomed him because they were all waiting for him.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">named</st> <st data-num="2383" class="">Jairus</st>, who <st data-num="5225" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="758" class="">leader</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="4864" class="">synagogue</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2064" class="">came up</st>. <st data-num="4098" class="">Falling</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="3844" class="">at</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus’</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st>, he <st data-num="3870" class="">pleaded</st><n id="5" /> with <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to <st data-num="1525" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st>,

because he had an only daughter, about twelve years old, and she was dying.

As Jesus was on his way, the crowds pressed around him.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Now</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> there who had been <st data-num="1722">suffering from</st> a <st data-num="4511 129">hemorrhage</st><n id="2" /> for <st data-num="1427" class="">twelve</st> <st data-num="2094" class="">years</st><n id="3" /> but <st data-num="2480" class="">could</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="2323" class="">healed</st> <st data-num="575" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">anyone</st>.

She<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4334">came up</st> <st data-num="3693" class="">behind</st> Jesus<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="681">touched</st> the <st data-num="2899" class="">edge</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">cloak</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3916">at once</st> the <st data-num="4511 129">bleeding</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2476" class="">stopped</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">asked</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="5101">Who</st> was it who <st data-num="681" class="">touched</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>?” When they <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="720" class="">denied</st> it, <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="1988">Master</st>, the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowds</st> are <st data-num="4912" class="">surrounding</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="598" class="">pressing<n id="4" /> against</st> you!”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="5100">Someone</st> <st data-num="681">touched</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> that <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> has <st data-num="1831">gone out</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.”

When<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> she could <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2990" class="">escape notice</st>,<n id="2" /> she <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="5141" class="">trembling</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4363" class="">fell down before</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<st data-num="1799"> In<n id="3" /> the presence of</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st>, she <st data-num="518" class="">explained</st> <st data-num="1223 3739">why</st><n id="4" /> she had <st data-num="681" class="">touched</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">how</st> she had been <st data-num="3916" class="">immediately</st> <st data-num="2390" class="">healed</st>.
Then he said to her, “Daughter, your faith has made you well. Go in peace.”
While he was still speaking, someone from the synagogue leader’s house came and said, “Your daughter is dead; do not trouble the teacher any longer.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> this, he <st data-num="611" class="">told</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st>; <st data-num="3441" class="">just</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> she will be <st data-num="4982" class="">healed</st>.”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161">Now</st> when he <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>, Jesus<n id="1" /> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="863" class="">let</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="1525">go in</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1508">except</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st>, <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3816">child’s</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> they were <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2799" class="">wailing</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2875" class="">mourning</st><n id="2" /> for <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>, <st data-num="1161">but</st> he <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="3361">Stop</st> your <st data-num="2799" class="">weeping;</st> she is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="599" class="">dead</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2518" class="">asleep</st>!”

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> they began <st data-num="2606">making fun</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> because they <st data-num="1492" class="">knew</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> she was <st data-num="599" class="">dead</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2902">gently took</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> by the <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st> and <st data-num="5455">said</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="3816">Child</st>, <st data-num="1453">get up</st>.”

<st data-num="846" class="">Her</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> <st data-num="1994" class="">returned</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> she <st data-num="450">got up</st> <st data-num="3916" class="">immediately</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="3" /> he <st data-num="1299" class="">told</st> them to <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="846">her</st> something to <st data-num="2068">eat</st>.
Her parents were astonished, but he ordered them to tell no one what had happened.
